bow: my sis in law just had baby what should bring her when visit the hospital she should need anything and she very sentimental going to bring today newspaper as momento for my nephew but what else would be nice no one brought me anything when was in the hospital and ca think of anything besides the usual balloons and stuffed animal scenario thanks my mother in law brought me platter of all the things couldn eat while was pregnant and it was so funny and sweet and thoughtful and practical finger foods like sliced meat you find on charcuterie board as well as soft cheeses etc lip balm hospitals are dry also all the snacks also take photos if she is coffee drinker bring her good cup of coffee and maybe reusable cup that keeps drinks warm its tough to get time to finish drink with newborn and omg all wanted was decent coffee when was in hospital having my babies amp x200b good hand cream is nice gift there lots of handwashing with new babies so hands get dry think have given lot maybe boob or something for huge glass of chocolate milk so maybe chocolate milk or just chocolate mmm yes food she likes and that is easy to eat one handed agree with the coffee or food suggestion get her favorite starbucks drink second this my friend got me sushi sushi coffee cold meat sandwiches oh and sneaky small bottle of champagne all of the things you cant have while pregnant are all the things that wanted but in all seriousness food snacks and drinks for her and also take lots of photos this had gd with my second pregnancy and all wanted after delivering was frappuccino thermos mug filled with chocolate she can eat the chocolate then she got mug to keep her coffee tea warm until she gets to it we all know hospital food sucks text her and ask what meal she would like homemade or from restaurant nobody offered food or asked while was postpartum but that all really wanted blueberries https www google com amp www dailymail co uk health article 4311698 amp blueberries virtually eliminate baby blues experts say html but then also other food or snacks that she likes or could have while pregnant non google amp link here https www dailymail co uk health article 4311698 blueberries virtually eliminate baby blues experts say html ^^i ^^am ^^a ^^bot ^^please ^^send ^^me ^^a ^^message ^^if ^^i ^^am ^^acting ^^up ^^click ^^ here https medium com danbuben why amp is bad for your site and for the web e4d060a4ff31 ^^to ^^read ^^more ^^about ^^why ^^this ^^bot ^^exists if she breastfeeding consider decaf if you can afford it necklace charm or mothers ring would be nice or maybe earrings the baby birthstone mom just performed an amazing feat make it about her would of been over the moon for coffee from dunkin insulated mug for said coffee book to read to the little one with sentimental writing inside on the first page my old bestie did this for my lo and still in awe over how sweet the momento is to me easy snacks sweets lot of candid photos one of my favorite photos is the first night before visiting hours ended my good friend visited and the picture is of me holding little one while looking down at her with all the stuff hooked up to me my hands are so swollen and look so exhausted but the look at my face at my lo is just so loving those photos when people do know your taking them are the best did mention snacks actual champagne or wine food to enjoy get her favorite meal omg this so much had gestational diabetes and had to avoid carbs for six months of my pregnancy my husband brought olive garden to the hospital after our baby was born and did deep dive into chicken fettuccine alfredo it was one of the best meals of my life water pitcher warm water running down the vulva area helps the burning when she peeing the first days weeks am not even joking can you bake her lactation cookies have no idea if these help anything but it was at least be nice thought surely the hospital has equipment for aftercare it usually one of those things no one thinks about needing ve brought one to all my births def the best thing brought my new go to gift is an edible arrangement it cute cut up fruit type arrangement easy clean snacking it can easily be diyed too when can she go home from the hospital the nicest thing that received when gave birth was on the day got home friend bought over two huge casseroles of cooked food that could keep in the fridge or freeze so that did have to cook for the first few days it was so thoughtful it was something they themselves made and it was so useful unnecessary the cdc did rigorous testing and proved there are no adverse effects on breastfeeding baby when drinking moderate amount of coffee cups day the caffeine doesn enter their system the doctor wrote me prescription for percocet before left the hospital even though told him was breastfeeding apparently that considered safe too but threw it away so your breast milk has the same drug load as your blood and with things like caffeine it does transfer with perfect efficiently and it watered down by your whole blood volume so having one caffeinated drink while breast feeding is like having one decaf while pregnant if not less percocet and coffee are fine for breastfeeding mothers would have made it through the first week without percocet definitely lunch baby wipes hospitals tend to provide cheap ones that do stand up to babies first poops the black tar she can also use these to wipe her face armpits until she can shower also consider bringing her big canvas tote bag as all these nice gifts from family and the hospital have to leave somehow food is always great but also consider making some froze meals that can be stretched out made big batches of ravioli and meatballs and tamales so could pull out serving amount and eat casseroles are great too for the immediate return home but talking about providing frozen meals for weak and when baby cluster feeds and she feels overwhelmed last but not least take picture if her and the baby lot of people get so focused on pix with visitors that they forget to snap pic of the amazing woman who did the work have no pictures of me and lo in the hospital and it still makes me sad exactly just bring her some food when she come home so he can focus in the baby at least the first days and if you have time to help just help her cleaning the house got it thank you my favourite things that family brought me ice cold ball of lettuce for sore breasts just peel the pieces off and they curve around your boobs so it like an adhesive ice pack kfc was really craving fried chicken and been living on remote farm for months so hadn had access to fast food red wine courtesy of bro in law my milk hadn come in yet and my son was on formula for his first few days as he is four weeks early so was able to have my first few sips of wine in months it wasn epic like thought it be but still appreciated the gesture as it shows how well my family understood me had been pining for wine food and drinks that she missed or that just are not hospital food are great suggestions if you go with something that is not consumable though please take into account how easily it can be packed up when it time to go home we had so much stuff that we had to pack up to go home my husband made two or three trips to the car without me and of course even if had been able to walk hospitals typically wheel new moms out in wheelchairs for liability reasons so stuffed animals balloons and flowers which are nice and very thoughtful are not the easiest to load up unless she and her husband will have family or friends helping to take things home my husband brought me fancy coffee my first pp morning and my dumbass spilled it all over myself and the bed don do that my parent brought me an italian sub and variety of italian cookies was too nauseous to appreciate the sub but those cookies came in handy later when was starving and baby was breastfeeding for every one of my births we got birth day cake with the baby name written on it it was always just premade cake from grocery bakery but post delivery and starting breastfeeding you get hungry so it practical and very sentimental omg mine too that spicy tuna roll was lit just make sure it lettuce and not cabbage cabbage will dry up your milk supply food hospital food tends to suck ask her what she wants for snacks lunch etc if she nursing she will likely be thirsty all the time well insulated cup with lid or straw that cna be refilled with ice and water might be helpful bottle of booze and platter of sushi that heavy on tuna box of cupcakes and or donuts had gestational diabetes so little biased food that is the only thing want people to bring me during and after my hospital stay when have my little one wanted burger and shake before you head over ask if anything sounds good like fuzzy blankets throws when in the couch or just hanging out like to be covered my sil knows this and brought me fuzzy blanket throw to the hospital would never have packed one and didn didn even think about asking for one but it was fantastic to have if your sil gets cold or likes fuzzy thinks get 10 throw from marshall or costco— it was really thoughtful and practical this is the scientific explanation but swear when my baby was smaller one regular soda for me and she wouldn nap for the rest of the day and then it would be hard to get her to bed at night anecdotal at best but it kept me away from caffeine for over year lol my friend brought me my favorite beer we split one bottle anything else she wasn eating or drinking would be fun too ha am the worst the greatest gift my family gave me was not showing up to the hospital actually only told my parents and my in laws when had my babies was tired and did want to put myself back together for company and wanted to get breastfeeding nailed down step make sure you have permission to visit while she in the hospital you probably already have this but if not this it crucial hospitals in my area always send moms home with peribottle made specifically for this purpose fridababy makes an amped up version called the momwasher https www fridababy com product momwasher that so awesome do know about coffee if she at all sensitive to caffeine it might keep her up when she wants to sleep yessss food that she can reheat easily or if she lives somewhere with delivery options gift card brilliant idea realised needed thermos mug after had my baby just so there was no risk of spilling my hot drink on baby while was stuck with her cluster feeding also chocolate is must do bring her stuff to the hospital it just more crap to schlep home what appreciated most was food that my mom cooked and left at our house food that could be frozen and easily re heated for days we were so overwhelmed when we came home that cooking was possible and having that lasagna and eggplant was huge help we ate it for days snacks hospital food is terrible but she ll need her strength back if you know stuff she likes all the better but high protein things like nuts and refreshing bite size fruit were what was craving gift cards for takeout yes something to help her take care of herself while feeding and soothing baby most baby gifts are baby focused and most gifts aimed at moms are this will make it easier to take care of baby but people usually forget about mom taking care of mom recommend treats she can keep next to her breastfeeding and maybe nice box to keep them in she ll get hungry and thirsty sitting there stuck with baby so she needs something close and on hand if you bring her meal when she comes home put the hot food in disposable pan so she can shove it in the fridge til she ready to have dinner based on baby schedule and bring any cold food in cheap containers she does need any extra dishes to return and she needs the option of eating on her own time make sure you pre wrso the paper in something to keep it safe she will be too busy for get around to it and when she finds it in years will be relieved guess was at fancy hospitals with my because the food was good and there was snack cart available too so didn need food liked things for the baby—a nice velcro swaddle blanket or month zip up sleepers food food food how about buying her newborn photo session didn want to think about the details of arranging it at the hospital but often they do them right there sad didn get one now this had gd and gave birth in the early hours of valentine day between my mom husband and my mil was happily set short answer food does it help lot so nervous about peeing after giving birth reallllyyy love my contigo coffee thermos it has never ever spilled and throw it in my bag or car with no issues it also keeps my coffee warm for hours and hours you can also drink it with one hand push button to sip no awkward cover to snap food and no gifts that are too big getting packed and baby in the car and stuff so balloons would be pain keep it light thought was the loner in this looks like not whew don feel so bad about not having anyone visit for my 2nd now in addition to the indulgent and sentimental things bring her pair of lanisoh brand gel soothies something for the nurses doctors hospital staff it is something new parents don have time to think about but from what hear is always appreciated by caregivers midwife here stay well hydrated keeps urine dilute concentrated pee stings more friend of mine brought us pepperoni pizza it rocked while this is true do want to point out that for some women for some weird reason large amounts of caffeine can possibly affect milk production especially in the early days of starting the milk supply might not even happen to this lady maybe bring her an option of regular or decaf coffees she ll probably appreciate it either way love my kleen kanteen coffee thermos because it takes me half the day to get through my coffee now and the mug means it still warm hot when can get to it little things like that are huge for me feeling human haha yes was gestational diabetic and wanted nothing more than sweets lol if it her first baby get her mom mug or something would have cried and forever used this all of the food or gift cards for pizza or restaurants if you aren great cook sentiments are still there definitely call before we had lot of people stop in thankfully everyone just came in for 10 15 minutes which was nice second food as so many have already suggested also if the hospital did not give her one get her giant travel mug with straw for water juice if she is breastfeeding still have my ginormous mug that the hospital gave me when my daughter was born seven years ago took it everywhere with me until could no longer nurse would do my laps pushing the baby around the maternity ward and stop at the kitchen and fill it up with juice or water and continue on my way also if she is in for bit due to section an itunes or the app store for whatever type of phone device she has gift card would be nice thing to have sure the baby takes up lot of your time but there is still lot of down time in between the diapers and feeding and cuddling if you re in for five days straight and the hospital tv usually only gets few channels the only thing remember watching on tv was snl lindsay lohan was hosting and the news remember finding out that my first celebrity crush davy jones was too young to realize he was no longer the cute 18 year old boy loved when watching the re runs on nickelodeon in the 80s had passed away that morning shortly before my daughter was born cried which most people thought was funny then got mad at them for laughing because was slightly hormonal and drugged up and starving hangry my blackberry torch rip and my kindle fire were my saviors that week as my then husband only stuck around until \~8pm each night because he had to be up for work the next morning also good for books to read while nursing less hand involvement for the baby to the expectant parents whenever am invited to baby shower the thing is fucking *magical swear it is the only reason even got two hours hours of sleep some nights it only like 10 15 and worth every penny realize am rambling sorry good luck and congratulations oooh good point do overstay your welcome there very little time to yourself when you re in the hospital there always nurse doctor lactation consultant sanitation nutrition coming it at all times of day and night momma just exhausted and feels like her boobs are out all the time my sister in law brought me big beautiful turkey sandwich it was the best thing ve ever eaten in my life got gift card for my favorite sushi delivery place and loved it even better than bringing sushi because got to pick when and where wanted to redeem it so could choose time really enjoy it wonderful idea when first read this post my first thought was gift her the pleasure of not having to entertain visitors honestly where from this is the norm hospitals are generally just for the parents and kids and maybe fleeting visit from new grandparents to meet the baby though that often at home too it does help that most hospitals around here discharge new parents fairly quickly and we have in home after care seconding this have the snap lid instead of the button one but contigo is awesome at keeping drinks hot almost *too* hot even throw my very full cup into my purse and carry it around with me until can drink it with absolutely no leakage issues honestly the only issue ve had was when my son figured out how to open it himself and started dumping it everywhere no the body is *really* good at what it does lot of things do make it into the breastmilk another example is when someone gets mastitis and is put on antibiotics to clear the infection it recommended to continue breastfeeding through the whole ordeal there no ill effects on the baby women bodies are amazing assuming you have access to their house text them and see if they forgot anything at home we forgot our chromecast and would have killed to have someone swing by home and get it gave birth at the mayo clinic ranked hospital maybe by vip patients but def not from locals and was surprised at how good their food was ordered everything could from there but would ve definitely appreciated some baked goods from elsewhere like cream cheese danish or something equally as fattening and full of sugar yeah appreciate the research and medical opinions but if have another baby still going to avoid caffeine and other drugs while breastfeeding yes have friend that keeps saying when the baby comes let me know when you re ready ll drop casserole by it so sweet and well meaning but in reality like just leave me alone for about month if you come by even if you try to make it low pressure feel like have to look presentable and entertain you having babies is catch 22 everyone wants to see them understandably but yet it the least ideal time to have visitors had section with my first and will be with this one as well ll be recovering some surgery again and just want to be left alone removed how about phone card apparently people with new babies find it too costly to call relatives to announce the birth addababyitsaboy this thread has made me laugh be careful what you say you may be down voted for being cautious breast feeding mother coffee and percocets this is america after all snacks granola kind bars hair ties baby nail file my sil brought me there in the hospital and they were god send removed birthed both of mine at the cleveland clinic their food is actually pretty decent and for postpartum patients they wheel ed around dessert cart every evening with restaurant quality fancy desserts still remember the cream puff nearly as big as my head did not want to leave if she super sentimental would see if any of the local shops can do an engraved or painted keepsake with the baby info like alphabet blocks with name birth date weight and height or porcelain baby shoe with the same info for regular items gift cards for places that deliver to their house housekeeping or dog walking also right now might seem like the perfect time but do forget after the dust settles in few weeks she will need pick me up at that time would say lunch out get nails done or facial glad you had access to wonderful hospital food also ditto on the baked goods craved carbs pasta oatmeal bread potatoes is that normal for postpartum cravings haha can feel how great that meal was for you it like all five senses appreciate and enjoy that first amazing meal post baby and birth my mom brought me unpasteurized apple cider it was my favorite gift liked the frida momwasher lot more than the one got from the hospital it was easier to use never had any stinging from peeing despite lots of stitches but it was nice for cleaning all of the blood off multiple times per day also get handheld shower head if you can that was amazing this is what came to suggest too when we were leaving the hospital we already had so much stuff between my bag and pillow my baby bag my husband bag the car seat the baby herself plus the two flower arrangements and balloon bouquet do you know how hard it is to hold two flower arrangements in the back seat of car while balloons are floating around your head that you re trying to keep out of your 36 hour old baby face just take practical gifts to the home once you have permission to visit sorry about the rant ve obviously been scarred food as many have said here food is always welcome after the birth of baby pack it into freezable containers in various serving sizes based on the size of her family one handed food would have been godsend to me when my babies were new things like muffins or mini quiches something with nutritional punch lots of oats and nuts sees and berries if she is breastfeeding or doing formula she will still be up at all hours holding babe in one arm ll have to look into that really hope that my case too lol thank you for the tips didn think about that thank you speaking for myself yes absolutely used it every single time right was so giddy on carbs that my face hurt from laughing dry shampoo hand cream coffee one handed snacks an extra long phone charger cable an amazon gift card cute no slip socks front tying robe voucher for one night free babysitting no questions asked just my dream list of what wish had gotten in the hospital lol woman from my baby yoga class just told me how her sister did this for her with her first will definitely be stealing this idea she said the whole family sang happy birthday to the new baby and then sat around eating tasty cake it sounded so sweet amp x200b would have really appreciated pizza get her something super nice to eat and maybe nice fancy coffee sent my husband out to get me kfc and starbucks cos refused to have any visitors it was so tasty bring her cake or something decadent my aunt had gestational diabetes arrived at the hospital with gallon of mcalister sweet tea local chain with the sweetest best tea she said it was the best gift lol and if you think of it food for dad our hospital kinda sucked in terms of food for dad margaritas lol jk definitely food always appreciated people bringing me food meh downvote me if you want still wo change anything her favorite food that she could eat during pregnancy please makes sure it still edible craved fries so badly and really appreciated that they brought them but they were stone cold food leave it in their home moisturisers but otherwise take your cue from the parents sometimes they want visitors and help but for others they just want to be hermits for while
